title: Why Movistar Gave Nairo Quintana a Lifeline: ‘Cycling Was Not Fair with Him’
content:
Eusebio Unzué says Colombian's arrival will take pressure off Enric Mas, laments missing out on signing Carlos Rodríguez: 'He had an escape clause in his pre-contract.'

Read the full article at Why Movistar Gave Nairo Quintana a Lifeline: ‘Cycling Was Not Fair with Him’ on Velo.
author: ahood
